FuncDef: This command configures the Segment Routing mapping server database in IS-IS.
CLIs: sid-map node-sid { index <value> [ range <value> ] } prefix { { <ip-address/mask> } | { <ip-address> } { <netmask> } } [ set-flags { s } ] [ level { 1 | 2 | 1/2 } ] [ clear-n-flag ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the node SID index for the IS-IS prefix which will be advertised in a SID/Label Binding TLV. Values-0 to 4294967295. ParamDefault: Default- none
Specifies the node SID range for the IS-IS prefix which will be advertised in a SID/Label Binding TLV. Values-0 to 65535. ParamDefault: Default- none
Specifies the IP address and mask. Values-ip-address: a.b.c.d. (host bits must be 0).
Specifies the IP address netmask. Values-a.b.c.d. (network bits all 1 and host bits all 0).
Specifies the flooding scope of the SID/Label binding TLV. ParamDefault: Default- S-flag clearThe TLV is not leaked by routers receiving the mapping server advertisement
Configures the mapping server own flooding scope for the generated SID/Label binding TLV. ParamDefault: Default- 1/2
Specifies whether the node-sid flag (N-flag) should be cleared in a SID Label Binding TLV.
